00015 UIBibleStudyWidget::UIBibleStudyWidget(boost::shared_ptr<const TranslationManager> translation_manager, QWidget *parent) :
00016     QWidget(parent),
00017     m_results_model(new SearchResultsModel(translation_manager)),
00018     m_starred_verses_model(new StarredVersesModel(translation_manager)),
00019     m_browse_verses_model(new BrowseVersesModel(translation_manager)),
00020     m_search(new UISearchWidget(translation_manager)),
00021     m_results(new UISearchResultsWidget(m_results_model)),
00022     m_starred_verses(new UIStarredVersesWidget(m_starred_verses_model)),
00023     m_text(new UITextViewWidget(translation_manager, m_starred_verses_model)),
00024     m_browse(new UIBrowseVersesWidget(m_browse_verses_model))
00025 {
00026     QObject::connect(m_search, SIGNAL(search_complete(boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults>)),
00027                      m_results, SLOT(display_search_results(boost::shared_ptr<ISearchResults>)));
00028 
00029     QObject::connect(m_text, SIGNAL(verse_starred(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)), m_starred_verses, SLOT(add_starred_verse(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)));
00030     QObject::connect(m_text, SIGNAL(verse_unstarred(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)), m_starred_verses, SLOT(remove_starred_verse(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)));
00031     QObject::connect(m_results, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)));
00032     QObject::connect(m_browse, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)));
00033     QObject::connect(m_starred_verses, SIGNAL(verse_display_changed(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)), m_text, SLOT(display_text(boost::shared_ptr<VerseDisplay>)));
00034 
00035     QFont app_font = QApplication::font();
00036     app_font.setPointSize(12);
00037     app_font.setFamily("Bitstream Vera Sans");
00038     QApplication::setFont(app_font);
00039 
00040     QVBoxLayout* left_column = new QVBoxLayout();
00041 
00042     left_column->addWidget(m_browse, 3);
00043     left_column->addWidget(m_starred_verses, 1);
00044 
00045     QVBoxLayout* right_column = new QVBoxLayout();
00046

00048     right_column->addWidget(m_results);
00049     right_column->addWidget(m_text);

00051     QHBoxLayout* layout = new QHBoxLayout();
